# Data Analysis

```{r}
# Install and load required libraries
install.packages(c("ggplot2", "readxl", "dplyr", "knitr"))

# Load the libraries
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)

```

# Ball Possesion vs Rankings

```{r}
# Define team-specific color palette
team_colors <- c(
  "fenerbahce" = "blue",
  "galatasaray" = "red",
  "besiktas" = "black",  # Updated to black
  "trabzonspor" = "maroon"
)

# Create scatter plot with regression line
ggplot(df, aes(x = avg_shoots, y = avg_goals_scored, color = Team)) +
  geom_point(size = 3) +  # Data points
  geom_smooth(method = "lm", se = FALSE) +  # Regression line
  scale_color_manual(values = team_colors) +  # Team colors
  labs(
    title = "Relationship Between Shots and Goals",
    x = "Average Shots",
    y = "Average Goals Scored",
    color = "Team"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()

# Print a message
print("This is a scatter plot showing the relationship between shots and goals scored.")
```
